description: Siberian Peashrub (Caragana arborescens) is an amazing deciduous shrub with a multitude of uses. It reaches a height of 2-4 meters, and its hardy nature makes it one of the most versatile plants. It stands up to extreme temperatures and can thrive even in drought conditions, and does not require heavy fertilization. Its pink and yellow flowers are beautiful and its bright green foliage provides a pleasant contrast in the garden. The Siberian Peashrub also has edible pea pods that can be used in cooking for a delicious flavor. Whether in a garden or in the landscape, this shrub is a must to consider.
